name: WUB Alarm Clock
short_description:
WUB is a simple alarm clock used to play an mp3 at a given time.
Features
1. Multiple alarms can be done, with each alarm getting its own tray icon.
2. Command line is supported. Open about box for info.
3. Volume of alarm music can be decided.
4. Configuration can be saved as default, useful for often used alarm.
   To clear this, please click go to about box.
5. Very little footprint.
6. Can be run without admin privileges.
7. Ensures that user is actually awake before alarm is turned off.
8. Portability and stealth.
9. Monitor can be turned off at time of setting alarm. (laptops only)
For license information/credits/source/language, please open About box.
***About box : Right click on tray icon/main GUI and click about.
***Alarms will not wake from sleep!
***Alarms will not survive a restart.

Plans
1. Replace Looper with BASS library.
2. Create one unified icon for all alarms.
3. Allow for saving of more than one profile.
summary: Simple lightweight alarm clock to play mp3 files at specified time
